column1: A funeral mass will be held at 11:00 AM on Tuesday
column3: 2015 at Christ the King Catholic Church. The Very Rev. Tony Fontenot will officiate. Burial will follow in Sacred Heart Catholic Church Cemetery under the direction of Johnson Funeral Home. Visitation will begin on Monday in the funeral home from 2:00 PM until 9:00 PM with a rosary being recited at 6:00 PM. Visitation will resume on Tuesday from 8:00 AM until leaving for the church at 10:30 AM.
